explanation: [0-0] The video is a triptych, with black backgrounds at the top and bottom, and a muddy mound of earth in the middle of the screen.

[0-8] A mud-covered hand slaps a pile of mud onto the mound. The scene then switches to a clearing in a forest, where a giant animal sculpture made of mud stands. The sculpture has its mouth wide open, revealing sharp teeth, and some smoke is coming out of its nostrils. A man wearing a hat and a vest is standing next to the sculpture. The man first smears some mud above the eyes of the sculpture, then goes to the mouth of the sculpture, kneels down and smears some mud above the mouth, then stands up and puts his hands into the nostrils of the sculpture. He then turns around and walks to the right, picks up some wood, goes back into the mouth of the sculpture and puts it in, then gets up and walks out.
